There are several additional client expectations with regards to protection of their sensitive information and intellectual property (IP).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Security is everyone's responsibility and requires every one of us to follow certain controls and be aware of the impact of incidents and non-compliance. All the policies and procedures are detailed within this training and we expect your participation in compliance.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Every section contains EPAM and Macquarie's IP protection expectation.
